name: textinput

textcolor.description: Text color for the control. See bgColor for color options.

height.description: Height value of the control, in pixels.

message.description: Message text to display if validation fails.

range.description: Minimum value, maximum value range, separated by a comma. Valid only for numeric data.

notsupported.description:
The text to display if the page containing a Java applet-based
	cfform control is opened by a browser that does not support Java or has Java support disabled.

required.description: Yes or No. If Yes, the user must enter or change text. Default is No.

onerror.description: Name of a JavaScript function to execute in the event of a failed validation.

maxlength.description: The maximum length of text entered.

bold.description: Yes for boldface text, No for medium text. Default is No.

onvalidate.description:
The name of a JavaScript function used to validate user input. The form object, input object,
	and input object value are passed to the routine, which should return TRUE if validation succeeds and
	FALSE otherwise. When used, the validate attribute is ignored.

italic.description: Yes for italicized text, No for normal text. Default is No.

size.description: Number of characters displayed before horizontal scroll bar displays.

width.description: Width value of the control, in pixels.

name.description: A name for the cftextinput control.

hspace.description: Horizontal spacing of the control, in pixels.

vspace.description: Vertical spacing of the control, in pixels.

value.description: Initial value that displays in the text control.

validate.description:
date: verifies format mm/dd/yy.
            eurodate: verifies date format dd/mm/yyyy.
            time: verifies time format hh:mm:ss.
            float: verifies floating point format.
            integer: verifies integer format.
            telephone: verifies telephone format ###-###-####. The
                separator can be a blank. Area code and exchange must
                begin with digit 1 - 9.
            zipcode: verifies, in U.S. formats only, 5- or 9-digit
                format #####-####. The separator can be a blank.
            creditcard: strips blanks and dashes; verifies number using
                mod10 algorithm. Number must have 13-16 digits.
            social_security_number: verifies format ###-##-####. The
                separator can be a blank.
            regular_expression: matches input against pattern
                attribute.

description:
Lets you place a single-line text entry box in a cfform. The tag also gives you control over
  font characteristics.
